pages.title: Tungsten
pages.text: Tungsten can only be found in the Nether, the only place deep and hot enough to allow the formation of this metal. Tough and with an insanely high melting point, working with this material can be a the telltale of a blacksmith's skill.
Tungsten can be found in the Nether between Y level 0 and 40 with a tendency to be in the middle, in medium-sized clusters.
